data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in North 24 Parganas, West Bengal, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of North 24 Parganas, West Bengal, India

data.prayer: Father, help the 110,108 believers in North 24 Parganas to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in North 24 Parganas, West Bengal, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, let those from the 110,108 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Baidya (Hindu traditions) people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of North 24 Parganas, West Bengal, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 110,108 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in North 24 Parganas.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.section_summary:
the county of North 24 Parganas, West Bengal, India has a population of 10,009,800.

We estimate North 24 Parganas has 110,108 people who might know Jesus, 121,452 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,778,240 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 10,009,800 citizens of North 24 Parganas, West Bengal, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.
